feed.title: WatchState Releases

entry.title: New release for WatchState: master-20250512-cafacdf3
entry.content:
• 4c6d4468 Add notice about autoconfigure. by arabcoders
  • 14f82c42 Make the first time webui access more user-friendly. by arabcoders
  • da664d46 minor documentation update by Splinter7914

What's Changed

  • minor documentation update by @Splinter7914 in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/662
  • Make the first time webui access more user-friendly. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/663

New Contributors

  • @Splinter7914 made their first contribution in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/662

Full Changelog: https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/compare/master-20250512-11767cd3...master-20250512-cafacdf3

entry.title: New release for WatchState: master-20250513-57580fbc
entry.content:
• 1cbd558b Update the Add backend flow to be more dynamic with the yes/no for options. by arabcoders
  • f542b38c Fix triggering force import from first backend. by arabcoders
  • e902d83c Update RestoreCommand to support both async/sync requests. by arabcoders
  • d38b3c71 Refactor lambda functions for consistent spacing and improve error handling in version retrieval by arabcoders
  • b2cac318 minor updates to env page. by arabcoders
  • 908bc405 remove accesstoken from open endpoints by arabcoders

What's Changed

  • minor documentation update by @Splinter7914 in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/662
  • Make the first time webui access more user-friendly. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/663
  • Update RestoreCommand to support both async/sync requests. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/664

New Contributors

  • @Splinter7914 made their first contribution in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/662

Full Changelog: https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/compare/master-20250512-11767cd3...master-20250513-57580fbc

entry.title: New release for WatchState: master-20250515-1dcde8cf
entry.content:
• b0663356 Finalizing auth migration by arabcoders
  • 77dea258 finalizing the move to user/pass auth. by arabcoders
  • 44da1121 Update the auth system. by arabcoders
  • 068cd270 disable Opacity on player page. by arabcoders
  • 0bf33f82 Remove the no api settings component by arabcoders
  • bc3ece35 Remove the need to enter api connection. by arabcoders
  • b0683d5d update console and logs stream to use fetchEventStream by arabcoders
  • 10901e52 update play routes. by arabcoders
  • 870fc607 Refactor how to we handle some sensitive env variables. by arabcoders
  • 4a4c9ddb WIP: support user/pass as auth method instead of current apikey usage by arabcoders
  • f396acc7 add conditions to Tautulli webhooks by Splinter7914
  • 1af94641 initial code to support login via username/password by arabcoders

What's Changed

  • add conditions to Tautulli webhooks by @Splinter7914 in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/665
  • Migrate to user/pass auth by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/666
  • Use auth system instead of api key for WebUI by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/667

Full Changelog: https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/compare/master-20250513-57580fbc...master-20250515-1dcde8cf

entry.title: New release for WatchState: master-20250516-2b8af698
entry.content:
• 9d9294b0 update to fix plex check pin request flow. by arabcoders
  • f73675de Reverted changes to plex ValidateToken by arabcoders
  • cd6bd635 Finalize Plex OAuth flow in Backend add. by arabcoders
  • 7c20a238 initial work to support plex oauth flow by arabcoders
  • fc903856 Refactor Plex headers handling by arabcoders
  • 157bcd45 With multi-user support, it doesn't make sense to log spam webhooks with invalid user ID, so we use Debug level instead and option to increase the level via debug_trace additional option by arabcoders
  • 66405cab Fix #670, tautulli will send lastViewedAt regardless if the item is marked as watched or not. by arabcoders
  • 1272d996 minor typo fixes by arabcoders

What's Changed

  • add conditions to Tautulli webhooks by @Splinter7914 in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/665
  • Migrate to user/pass auth by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/666
  • Use auth system instead of api key for WebUI by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/667
  • Fix Tautulli progress tracking by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/671
  • Finalize Plex OAuth flow in Backend add. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/672

Full Changelog: https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/compare/master-20250513-57580fbc...master-20250516-2b8af698

entry.title: New release for WatchState: master-20250518-1458e597
entry.content:
• d00c4b3e re-order frankenphp to be before copying the app. by arabcoders
  • ef8e54ad remove unused mbstring configuration and disable assertions in production by arabcoders
  • c9178897 update backend add/edit page to be more re-activate, added new option for plex backends, to mark user as guest. by arabcoders

Full Changelog: https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/compare/master-20250513-57580fbc...master-20250518-1458e597
